sentences.sContent: I dare not quit my post, though an unfaithful sentinel, whose sure reward is death and dishonour, when his dreary watch shall come to an end!
sentences.sContent_eng: I dare not quit my post, though an unfaithful sentinel, whose sure reward is death and dishonour, when his dreary watch shall come to an end!
sentences.sCn: 虽说我是个不忠于职守的哨兵，等到这种沉网的守望终了的时候，我所能得到的报酬只能是不光彩的死亡，但我仍不敢擅离岗位！

synos.tran: 拒付；使丢脸；拒绝承兑；不履行（诺言等）

words.tran: 不名誉的；无耻的；不受尊重的（等于dishonorable）
